data.comment: The repository supports the NPM build process based on UML models created and managed with the JSONEditor4Code. A JSON file defines the attributes and methods of a class and a JSON editor running in a browser allows the generation of Javascript code. In turn any alteration of the code in the folder src/ of the main Javascript code will update the UML model in the folder jscc/.

reposinfo.author: User Name

methods.name: capitalizeFirstLetter
methods.code: return string.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + string.slice(1);

methods.name: is_function
methods.code:
// test if an object is a function
  return !!(obj && obj.constructor && obj.call && obj.apply);
